title: Protesters block Negombo-Colombo road demanding fuel
body_lines: The Negombo-Colombo main road has been blocked for traffic at Kapuwatte by protesters demanding fuel, Ada Derana reporter said.
A group are protesting blocking the lanes towards Negombo on the main road while chanting slogans demanding that the government provide them with fuel, he said.
The lanes towards Negombo have reportedly been completely blocked as a resulted of this while it has also caused severe traffic congestion in the area.
